page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN EASTLEIGH
page.content: There are jobs for more than 30,000 people in Eastleigh.Most are in the light industry and commercial areas. The main reason for companies coming to the area are all linked with the excellent communications available by air,road(especially with the new M27 motorway now opened),and rail to the port of Southampton not far away. Most of the jobs are within trading estates such as Boyatt Wood and Chickenhall Lane.These small estates have been built near to houses so that they provide local jobs but do not swamp the area. The types of jobs are varied; precision engineering,boatbuilding, electronics,printing,car manufacture, construction,cable production,film setting,food processing,haulage, farming,horticulture and many more. Many have received Queens Awards.
